name: captivate
flavor_text:
If any opposing Pok√©mon is the opposite gender of
the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its
Sp. Atk stat.
effect_text_extend: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect_text_simple: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.
